snippet: The TBC Corporation has agreed to buy the automotive repair chain Midas for $11.50 a share, in a deal valued at roughly $310 million, including $137 million in Midas debt to be assumed by TBC, an automotive tire specialist.
abstract: The TBC Corporation has agreed to buy the automotive repair chain Midas for $11.50 a share, in a deal valued at roughly $310 million, including $137 million in Midas debt to be assumed by TBC, an automotive tire specialist.
